headline.sub: Suleika Jaouad, Her Boyfriend and Leukemia
headline.main: Love in the Time of Cancer

docs.snippet: During her yearlong battle with leukemia, Suleika Jaouad’s diagnosis has tested and strengthened her relationship with her boyfriend, who stuck by her side throughout her treatments....

headline.print_headline: A Patient for Now, but Maybe a Mother Someday
headline.main: Life, Interrupted: A Young Cancer Patient Faces Infertility

docs.snippet: Last spring, I found out I had leukemia. Before the horror of the news even had time to sink in, I had to absorb a second shock: The chemotherapy treatments that could save my life would also make me infertile, writes Suleika Jaouad....
docs.abstract: Last spring, I found out I had leukemia. Before the horror of the news even had time to sink in, I had to absorb a second shock: The chemotherapy treatments that could save my life would also make me infertile, writes Suleika Jaouad.

headline.main: With Rally, Senators Prove to Be Rangers’ Match

docs.snippet: The eighth-seeded Senators, trailing by two goals, scored twice in the second period and won Game 4 when Kyle Turris scored at 2:42 of overtime....
docs.abstract: Ottawa Senators defeat New York Rangers, 3-2, to tie NHL playoff series, 2-2.
docs.lead_paragraph: The eighth-seeded Senators, trailing by two goals, scored twice in the second period and won Game 4 when Kyle Turris scored at 2:42 of overtime.

headline.print_headline: Rangers Win Sixth Straight As Napoli Batters Red Sox
headline.seo: Rangers Beat Red Sox for Sixth Straight Win
headline.main: Rangers Win Sixth Straight as Napoli Batters Red Sox

docs.snippet: Mike Napoli hit a two-run homer and drove in four runs Wednesday night as the Texas Rangers completed a two-game sweep with a 6-3 win over the Red Sox in Boston....
docs.abstract: MLB Roundup; Texas Rangers complete a two game sweep with a 6-3 win over the Boston Red Sox; other results notes.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike Napoli hit a two-run homer and drove in four runs Wednesday night as the Texas Rangers completed a two-game sweep with a 6-3 win over the Red Sox in Boston.

headline.seo: Pakistani Judge Upholds 3 Women’s Choice of Islam

docs.snippet: A Pakistani judge ruled that three Hindu women who converted to Islam under disputed circumstances had chosen to remain with their new Muslim husbands....
docs.abstract: Pakistani judge rules that three Hindu women who converted to Islam under disputed circumstances had chosen to go with their new Muslim husbands, causing consternation among the families they left behind; decision meets with criticism from Hindu leaders and some rights activists, who maintain that the women were forcibly converted and that their cases would make Pakistan’s already embattled minorities even more insecure.
docs.lead_paragraph: A Pakistani judge ruled that three Hindu women who converted to Islam under disputed circumstances had chosen to remain with their new Muslim husbands.
